patthana20.9:4.1: Nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana20.9:5.1: Naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.9:6.1: Nasaraṇañca naaraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana20.9:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana20.9:10.1: Nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana20.9:10.2: Naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana20.9:11.1: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca … pe … napurejāte cattāri … pe … nakamme dve … pe … naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṃ … pe … navippayutte dve … pe … novigate tīṇi.
patthana20.9:14.1: Nasaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana20.9:15.1: Naaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.9:15.2: Naaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.9:15.3: Naaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa ca araṇassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana20.9:16.1: Nasaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.9:16.2: Nasaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana20.9:17.1: Naaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.9:17.2: Naaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana20.9:18.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri … pe … sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate satta.
patthana20.9:19.1: Nasaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo, purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.9:20.1: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta … pe … nasahajāte naaññamaññe nanissaye pañca … pe … napurejāte cha … pe … nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri … pe … noavigate cattāri.
patthana20.9:21.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
